```{r Importing Libraries}
library(raster)
library(tidyverse)
library(getlandsat)
library(sf)
library(mapview)
```

```{r Question 1}
palobb = readr::read_csv("../data/uscities.csv") %>%
  filter(city == "Palo") %>% 
  st_as_sf(coords = c("lng","lat"), crs = 4326) %>% 
  st_transform(5070) %>% 
  st_buffer(5000) %>% 
  st_bbox() %>% 
  st_as_sfc() %>% 
  st_as_sf()

mapview(palobb)
```

